attributes.action: Re-introduction of the death penalty for ‘without doubt’ murderers
attributes.background: Re-introduce the death penalty for anyone who murders someone in cold blood. Without doubt. Regardless of age, circumstances, race, religion, culture with no exceptions. A life for a life. No British tax payer should be paying to ‘keep’ evil people alive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
